verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord <WH3068>, when Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and all his army <WH2428>, and all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> of his dominion <WH3027>, and all the people <WH5971>, fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389>, and against all the cities <WH5892> there <WH559>, saying,

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; Go <WH1980> and speak <WH559> to Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>, and tell <WH559> him <WH559>, Thus says the Lord <WH3068>; Behold <WH5414>, I will give this city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall burn <WH8313> it with fire <WH784>:

And you shall not escape out <WH4422> of his hand <WH3027>, but shall surely <WH8610> be taken <WH8610>, and delivered <WH5414> into his hand <WH3027>; and your eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> the eyes <WH5869> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>, and he shall speak <WH1696> with you mouth <WH6310> to mouth <WH6310>, and you shall go <WH935> to Babylon <WH894>.

Yet hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>, O Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063>; Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of you <WH4191>, You shall not die by the sword <WH2719>:

But you shall die <WH4191> in peace <WH7965>: and with the burnings <WH4955> of your fathers <WH1>, the former <WH7223> kings <WH4428> which were before <WH6440> you <WH8313>, so shall they burn odors for you <WH5594>; and they will lament you <WH1945>, saying, Ah lord <WH113>! for I have pronounced <WH1696> the word <WH1697>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>.
Then Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spoke <WH1696> all these words <WH1697> unto Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem <WH3389>,

When the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>'s army <WH2428> fought <WH3898> against Jerusalem <WH3389>, and against all the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> that were left <WH3498>, against Lachish <WH3923>, and against Azekah <WH5825>: for these fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> remained <WH7604> of the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063>.

This is the word <WH1697> that came unto Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord <WH3068>, after <WH310> that the king <WH4428> Zedekiah <WH6667> had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with all the people <WH5971> which were at Jerusalem <WH3389>, to proclaim <WH7121> liberty unto them <WH1865>;

That every man <WH376> should let his manservant <WH5650>, and every man <WH376> his maidservant <WH8198>, being a Hebrew <WH5680> or a Hebrewess <WH5680>, go <WH7971> free <WH2670>; that none should serve <WH5647> himself of them <WH3064>, to know, of a Jew his brother <WH251>.

Now when all the princes <WH8269>, and all the people <WH5971>, which had entered <WH935> into the covenant <WH1285>, heard <WH8085> that every one <WH376> should let his manservant <WH5650>, and every one <WH376> his maidservant <WH8198>, go <WH7971> free <WH2670>, that none should serve <WH5647> themselves of them any more <WH8085>, then they obeyed, and let them go <WH7971>.

But afterward <WH310> they turned <WH7725>, and caused the servants <WH5650> and the handmaids <WH8198>, whom they had let go <WH7971> free <WH2670>, to return <WH7725>, and brought them into subjection <WH3533> for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids <WH8198>.
Therefore the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came to Jeremiah <WH3414> from the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH559>,

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>; I made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, out of the house <WH1004> of bondmen <WH5650>, saying <WH559>,

At the end <WH7093> of seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> let you go <WH7971> every man <WH376> his brother <WH251> a Hebrew <WH5680>, which has been sold <WH4376> unto you <WH5647>; and when he has served you six <WH8337> years <WH8141>, you shall let him go <WH7971> free <WH2670> from you <WH1>: but your fathers listened <WH8085> not unto me <WH5186>, neither inclined their ear <WH241>.

And you were now <WH3117> turned <WH7725>, and had done <WH6213> right <WH3477> in my sight <WH5869>, in proclaiming <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> every man <WH376> to his neighbor <WH7453>; and you had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> me in the house <WH1004> which is called <WH7121> by my name <WH8034>:

But you turned <WH7725> and polluted <WH2490> my name <WH8034>, and caused every man <WH376> his servant <WH5650>, and every man <WH376> his handmaid <WH8198>, whom you had set <WH7971> at liberty <WH2670> at their pleasure <WH5315>, to return <WH7725>, and brought them into subjection <WH3533>, to be unto you for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids <WH8198>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>; You have not listened <WH8085> unto me <WH7121>, in proclaiming liberty <WH1865>, every one <WH376> to his brother <WH251>, and every man <WH376> to his neighbor <WH7453>: behold <WH7121>, I proclaim a liberty <WH1865> for you <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH3068>, to the sword <WH2719>, to the pestilence <WH1698>, and to the famine <WH7458>; and I will make <WH5414> you to be removed <WH2189> into all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>.

And I will give <WH5414> the men <WH582> that have transgressed <WH5674> my covenant <WH1285>, which have not performed <WH6965> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285> which they had made <WH3772> before <WH6440> me <WH3772>, when they cut the calf <WH5695> in two <WH8147>, and passed <WH5674> between the parts there <WH1335>,

The princes <WH8269> of Judah <WH3063>, and the princes <WH8269> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, the eunuchs <WH5631>, and the priests <WH3548>, and all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>, which passed <WH5674> between the parts <WH1335> of the calf <WH5695>;

I will even give <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341>, and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> their life <WH5315>: and their dead bodies <WH5038> shall be for food <WH3978> unto the birds <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064>, and to the animals <WH929> of the earth <WH776>.

And Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> and his princes <WH8269> will I give <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies <WH341>, and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> their life <WH5315>, and into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894>'s army <WH2428>, which are gone up from you <WH5927>.

Behold <WH6680>, I will command, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>, and cause them to return <WH7725> to this city <WH5892>; and they shall fight <WH3898> against it <WH3920>, and take it <WH8313>, and burn it with fire <WH784>: and I will make <WH5414> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> a desolation <WH8077> without an inhabitant <WH3427>.
